ELECTROMAGNETIC WAVE

The arrangement of electromagnetic waves from the highest to the least wavelength (descending order): radio wave, microwave, infrared, visible, ultraviolet, X-rays, gamma rays. Note that the arrangement in terms of frequency is the opposite, you can remember it with a pneumonic (getting extra understanding vividly is more rear) – Gamma rays, x=rays, ultraviolet, visible light, infrared, microwave and radio wave (in descending order, i.e. gamma rays has the highest frequency snd the least wavelength).

The polarization of electromagnetic waves refers to the direction of the electric field of an electromagnetic wave. It is peculiar to electromagnetic waves.
